sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core';

@Component({
  selector: 'app-login',
  templateUrl: './login.component.html',
  styleUrls: ['./login.component.css']
})
export class LoginComponent {

}
<mat-card>
  <form (submit)="onAddPost(postForm)" #postForm="ngForm">

    <mat-form-field>
      <input matInput type="text" name="title" placeholder="Enter Title"
             [ngModel]="post.title"
             required minlength="3"
             #title="ngModel">
      <mat-error *ngIf="title.invalid">Title is a required field</mat-error>
    </mat-form-field>

    <mat-form-field>
      <textarea matInput rows="4" name="content" placeholder="Enter Content"
                [ngModel]="post.content"
                required minlength="5"
                #content="ngModel"></textarea>

      <mat-error *ngIf="content.invalid">Content is a required field</mat-error>
    </mat-form-field>

    <button mat-raised-button color="primary" type="submit">Login</button>

  </form>
</mat-card>
